Posts.Content: lhave just joined this site and find the comments so interesting and also kind of comforting to hear about other women with this disease.l wasdiagnosed in may 06 and had a mastectomy followedby chemo.3 months after completing chemo l founda lump in my arm pit while l was having herceptin. now after lymph gland removal and radiotherapy l am facing option of tamoxifen or arimadex as well as herceptin .l am seeing my lovely onc next week and l am trying to get as much research in as poss. l am 47 and am mourning the loss of my libido and feminity on top of everything else. can anyone advise?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin and dysplasia
